availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. English (Madison County, KY, farm laborer and soldier)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas A. English and Jane English. Farm laborer in Madison County in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as second corporal from January 15, 1862 to January 25, 1863. Died of wounds from battle on January 25, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 423.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 221.
